sentence.Network_en: The first criticality experiment of 5 MW Low Power Reactor ( LPR ) is described.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文介绍5MW低功率 堆 ( 5MWLPR ) 首次装料及首次临界试验.

sentence.Network_en: When the increasing stress reaches fracture criticality the earthquake occurs.
sentence.Network_cn: 当增长的应力达到破裂危险状态,地震就发生.

sentence.Network_en: Greater ceremony is appropriate for projects with greater criticality.
sentence.Network_cn: 项目的故障危害性越高,适用的正规度也越高.

means.word_mean: 2. a critical state; especially the point at which a nuclear reaction is self-sustaining
